content: the penny blanket is the perfect way to use up all those bits of leftover mandala yarn it s made with a corner-to-corner moss stitch that starts small and gets bigger as you go the mix of different yarn colors makes each blanket totally unique and full of personality what you ll learn corner to corner moss stitch also called linen stitch how to change colors in crochet how to cover up the yarn ups with a crochet border what you ll receive a digitally delivered crochet pattern pattern has links to video stitch tutorial supplies needed lion brand pound of love yarn lion brand mandala yarn 6 mm/ j crochet hook other info crochet skill level intermediate standard us terms finished size measures 46 x 48 1/2″ long instructions on how to make it a rectangle are included
